com.teamonehundred.pixelboat.entities

Class Boat

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.teamonehundred.pixelboat.entities.GameObject
      • com.teamonehundred.pixelboat.entities.MovableObject
        • com.teamonehundred.pixelboat.entities.Boat
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    CollisionObject
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    AiBoat, PlayerBoat

    public abstract class Boat
extends MovableObject
implements CollisionObject
    Base class for all boat types. Contains all functionality for moving, taking damage and collision
